author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

In this PR the MTD geometry description, both in the ```Geometry``` and ```RecoMTD``` packages, is cleaned by removing code that refers to the ETL ring-based scenario. The latest default scenario when this was active was D49, dropped from the release since a while.

The ETL numbering scheme is cleaned for the corresponding possible numbering construction.

At the same time, the unit test in ```RecoMTD/DetLayers``` is updated, by adding a test of the module finding in BTL with a scan in phi at fixed z.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, the MTD geometry unit tests are correctly running.
title: MTD geometry: remove code for obsolete ETL ring-based scenario
